extension.summary: Addon giving access to catchups tvshows for french channel
Plugin vidéo donnant acces aux replays de differentes chaines FR
extension.description:
This addon give access to frenches catchups TV Channel
Favourites can now show only unwatched TVShows : Browsing lot of folder is no more needed ;)

Ce plugin permet d'acceder aux replay TV de differentes chaines francophones.
Les favoris affichent seulement les emissions non visualisées : Plus besoin de parcourir 50 repertoires ;)
